name: 陳立憲
objective:
為使土木營建背景的學生具備跨域學習與創用能力，本課程扣合當前重要時趨 (如 SDGs, ESG, LCA, USR 等) 於民生基礎建設之因應；擇採相關物聯網數位科技作為課程編排，介紹內容如無線感測、低工耗遠域網路邊緣運算、雲端管理、數位平台、綠能蓄電、人工智能、低 / 無代碼等專案開發的理與例，以符綠智營建之踐履，以臻永續經管之倡議。
為求哲科合一，課程亦將思與學之認識與方法作簡扼介紹 (系統思考與問題導向學習)。
To achieve interdisciplinary learning and Innovative creativity for civil engineering students, this course presents the Internet of Things (IoT) to social infrastructure development including green-intelligent construction/maintenance and resilient adaptation briefly. To aim at the initiate of sustainable development goals (such as SDGs, ESG, LCA, USR) applied to civil engineering, some vital issues in this course would be focused as follows,
WSN (Wireless Network), LPWAN (Low Power Wide-Area Network),
Edge Computing, e-Cloud Management, Digitized Platform (PaaS/IaaS/SaaS), Green Energy and Cell, Artificial Intelligences, Low- & No-code techniques, etc.
Meanwhile, Systems Thinking (ST) and Problem-based Learning (PBL) , which are crucial for philosophy of science, would be introduced for this holistic approach.
